long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can provide you a concise layout when watching stream on Playone(https://www.goplayone.com/). Specifically, it will hide every contents except stream and chatroom.

*The software is still in the beta phase.

20230914-v1.1: Chats auto-scroll & show video control bar.
